sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.task_encryption.demo" name="Encryption Support - Single Context Task Encryption Demo" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" help="Encryption_Support_Plugin" state="published"> <description> Demo showing how encrypted form field's can be assigned to one encryption context. Adds two encrypted fields to the task table (Social Security Numbers and Credit Cards), a read-only encryption context field, an "Add Secure Info" button which unhides these fields, and an "Change Encryption" button to change the encryption context. After activating, personalize the incident form to add the three fields mentioned above. </description> <requires> <import plugin="com.glide.encryption"/> </requires> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Demo showing how encrypted form field's can be assigned to one encryption context. Adds two encrypted fields to the task table (Social Security Numbers and Credit Cards), a read-only encryption context field, an "Add Secure Info" button which unhides these fields, and an "Change Encryption" button to change the encryption context. After activating, personalize the incident form to add the three fields mentioned above.</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Encryption_Support_Plugin</help> <id>com.snc.task_encryption.demo</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>Encryption Support - Single Context Task Encryption Demo</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.task_encryption.demo/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.encryption</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.task_encryption.demo</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Encryption Support - Single Context Task Encryption Demo
